div.class: s_company_team pt48 pb48 o_colored_level o_animate o_anim_fade_in_down o_visible

p.style: margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 22px;

span.style: border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;
span.font: H.E. Mr. Muhammad Syrus Sajjad Qazi,

span.style: border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;
border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;

h4.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0.625rem; font-family: "Montserrat Alternates", "Odoo Unicode Support Noto", sans-serif; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.2; font-size: 1.53125rem;

span.style: border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;
border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;

a.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s;

span.style: border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;
color: rgb(10, 10, 10); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
color: rgb(10, 10, 10); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial;

a.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s; color: rgb(97, 97, 97); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.6;

span.style: color: rgb(10, 10, 10); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

a.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s;

div.p: Founder and chief visionary, Tony is the driving force behind the company. He loves to keep his hands full by participating in the development of the software, marketing, and customer experience strategies.
Mich loves taking on challenges. With his multi-year experience as Commercial Director in the software industry, Mich has helped the company to get where it is today. Mich is among the best minds.

div.class: col-lg-6 pt24 pb24 o_colored_level undefined shadow

div.p: Aline is one of the iconic people in life who can say they love what they do. She mentors 100+ in-house developers and looks after the community of thousands of developers.

Iris, with her international experience, helps us easily understand the numbers and improves them. She is determined to drive success and delivers her professional acumen to bring the company to the next level.

Founder and chief visionary, Tony is the driving force behind the company. He loves to keep his hands full by participating in the development of the software, marketing, and customer experience strategies.
Mich loves taking on challenges. With his multi-year experience as Commercial Director in the software industry, Mich has helped the company to get where it is today. Mich is among the best minds.
Aline is one of the iconic people in life who can say they love what they do. She mentors 100+ in-house developers and looks after the community of thousands of developers.

Iris, with her international experience, helps us easily understand the numbers and improves them. She is determined to drive success and delivers her professional acumen to bring the company to the next level.

input.t-att-autofocus: 'autofocus' if login and not only_passwords else None
